title: Hiver <> Genesis Media Limited - AI Feature Commercials

signals.problem_statement: The AI compose feature is underutilized by team members despite its usefulness to some individuals.
signals.customer_ask: Suggestions on how to encourage team members to use AI compose.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a tool that can review legal agreements and contracts, which is a significant part of their work.
signals.customer_ask: A feature that allows uploading agreements for review against organizational norms and legal requirements.

signals.problem_statement: The current task management process is fragmented, with team members using different methods and tools.
signals.customer_ask: Integration of task management features into Hiver to centralize task handling.

signals.problem_statement: The customer lacks a centralized system for handling incoming legal requests, relying solely on email.
signals.customer_ask: A structured way to manage incoming requests through Hiver.
